mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE( RCP_SEQ, RCP_NM, RCP_WAY2, RCP_PAT2, INFO_WGT, INFO_ENG, INFO_CAR, INFO_PRO, INFO_FAT, INFO_NA, HASH_TAG, ATT_FILE_NO_MAIN, ATT_FILE_NO_MK, RCP_PARTS_DTLS, MANUAL01, MANUAL_IMG01, MANUAL02, MANUAL_IMG02, MANUAL03, MANUAL_IMG03, MANUAL04, MANUAL_IMG04, MANUAL05, MANUAL_IMG05, MANUAL06, MANUAL_IMG06, MANUAL07, MANUAL_IMG07, MANUAL08, MANUAL_IMG08, MANUAL09, MANUAL_IMG09, MANUAL10, MANUAL_IMG10, MANUAL11, MANUAL_IMG11, MANUAL12, MANUAL_IMG12, MANUAL13, MANUAL_IMG13, MANUAL14, MANUAL_IMG14, MANUAL15, MANUAL_IMG15, MANUAL16, MANUAL_IMG16, MANUAL17, MANUAL_IMG17, MANUAL18, MANUAL_IMG18, MANUAL19, MANUAL_IMG19, MANUAL20, MANUAL_IMG20, RCP_NA_TIP ) VALUES( #{rcp_seq}, #{rcp_nm}, #{rcp_way2}, #{rcp_pat2}, #{info_wgt}, #{info_eng}, #{info_car}, #{info_pro}, #{info_fat}, #{info_na}, #{hash_tag}, #{att_file_no_main}, #{att_file_no_mk}, #{rcp_parts_dtls}, #{manual01}, #{manual_img01}, #{manual02}, #{manual_img02}, #{manual03}, #{manual_img03}, #{manual04}, #{manual_img04}, #{manual05}, #{manual_img05}, #{manual06}, #{manual_img06}, #{manual07}, #{manual_img07}, #{manual08}, #{manual_img08}, #{manual09}, #{manual_img09}, #{manual10}, #{manual_img10}, #{manual11}, #{manual_img11}, #{manual12}, #{manual_img12}, #{manual13}, #{manual_img13}, #{manual14}, #{manual_img14}, #{manual15}, #{manual_img15}, #{manual16}, #{manual_img16}, #{manual17}, #{manual_img17}, #{manual18}, #{manual_img18}, #{manual19}, #{manual_img19}, #{manual20}, #{manual_img20}, #{rcp_na_tip} )
